messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pears, was  Attacks and such
messages.msgSnippet: Just ripe, not RIPE.  Geez, looks like I might still rule the CAMdom   If they are too ripe, then whiz them in your blender and make fruit leather with
messages.messageBody:
Just ripe, not RIPE. Geez, looks like I might still rule the CAMdom <g> If
they are too ripe, then whiz them in your blender and make fruit leather
with them. Or pear butter is just too yummy!

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: Tami <labigduquette@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 2:36 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Attacks and such


> I never have! But plan on it due to your post :) didnt even think
> about it, I do have a dehydrator somewhere in one of my piles :) Do
> they need to be ripe?
> Indiana Tami
